https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/o8alLhpTJUKuFPEU7dECEUj1MNL.jpg Captured Hearts, an insane serial killer/horror film, is a heart-jumping, heart-crushing - truly demented - roller coaster ride of mystery, violence, sex and gore. With a raging, climatic twist, all hearts end up in one place. And it's not where they're supposed to be. Bleeding Hearts
